TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ArrayTypeMismatchException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 嘗試在陣列中儲存錯誤類型的項目時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to store an element of the wrong type within an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當系統無法將元素轉換成陣列宣告的型別時，會擲回。 is thrown when the system cannot convert the element to the type declared for the array. 例如，類型的元素無法儲存在陣列因為不支援這些型別之間的轉換。For example, an element of type cannot be stored in an array because conversion between these types is not supported. 它是通常不需要應用程式擲回這個例外狀況。It is generally unnecessary for applications to throw this exception. 下列的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令會擲回:The following Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions throw : - ldelem。\<類型 >ldelem.\ - ldelemaldelema - stelem.\stelem.\ 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARRAYTYPEMISMATCH，其值 0x80131503。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARRAYTYPEMISMATCH, which has the value 0x80131503. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範案例其中就會擲回。The following code example demonstrates scenarios where is thrown. [!code-cpp[System.ArrayTypeMismatch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArrayTypeMismatch/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ArrayTypeMismatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArrayTypeMismatch/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArrayTypeMismatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArrayTypeMismatch/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息，說明錯誤，例如 「 來源陣列類型無法指派給目的地陣列型別 」。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Source array type cannot be assigned to destination array type." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.| ## Examples 下列範例示範的 ArrayTypeMismatchException() 建構函式類別。The following example demonstrates the ArrayTypeMismatchException() constructor of the class. 它包含的函式會採用兩個陣列當做引數，並檢查兩個陣列是否相同的型別。It contains a function which takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type. 如果陣列的類型不同，新擲回且然後呼叫方法中攔截。If the arrays are of different types, a new is thrown and then caught in the calling method. [!code-cpp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1/CPP/arraytypemismatch_constructor1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1/CS/arraytypemismatch_constructor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor1/VB/arraytypemismatch_constructor1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| ## Examples 下列範例示範的 ArrayTypeMismatchException(String) 建構函式類別。The following example demonstrates the ArrayTypeMismatchException(String) constructor of the class. 它包含的函式會採用兩個陣列當做引數，並檢查兩個陣列是否相同的型別。It contains a function which takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type. 如果陣列的類型不同，新擲回且然後呼叫方法中攔截。If the arrays are of different types, a new is thrown and then caught in the calling method. [!code-cpp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2/CPP/arraytypemismatch_constructor2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2/CS/arraytypemismatch_constructor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor2/VB/arraytypemismatch_constructor2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 Null 參考，目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範建構函式的類別。The following code example demonstrates the constructor of the class. 它包含會做為引數的兩個陣列，並檢查兩個陣列是否屬於相同類型的函式。It contains a function that takes two arrays as arguments and checks whether the two arrays are of the same type. 如果陣列的類型不同，新擲回且然後呼叫方法中攔截。If the arrays are of different types, a new is thrown and then caught in the calling method. [!code-cpp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3/CPP/arraytypemismatch_constructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3/CS/arraytypemismatch_constructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArrayTypeMisMatch_Constructor3/VB/arraytypemismatch_constructor3.vb#1)]
